SELECT USER_ID AS USERID ,USER_NAME AS USERNM ,USER_PASS AS PASS ,USER_EMAIL AS EMAIL ,USER_USE_YN AS USEYN ,TO_CHAR(INST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INDATE ,INST_USER AS INUSER ,f_pvtcol(cursor( select ROLE_ID from SYS_USER_ROLE B where A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ),',') AUTH ,TO_CHAR(UPDT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDTDATE ,UPDT_USER AS UPDTUSER FROM SYS_USER A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{map.usernm } || '%'

SELECT A.ROLE_ID code ,A.ROLE_NAME name ,#{map.pid} userid ,CASE WHEN B.ROLE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS auth ,TO_CHAR(B.UPDT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') updtdate ,B.UPDT_USER updtuser FROM SYS_ROLE A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE B ON B.USER_ID = #{map.pid} AND A.ROLE_ID = B.ROLE_ID --'USER_ID' WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY auth DESC, NAME
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO SYS_USER S USING DUAL ON (S.USER_ID = #{userid}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.USER_NAME = #{usernm} , S.USER_PASS = #{pass} , S.USER_EMAIL = nvl(#{email},' ') , S.USER_USE_YN = #{useyn } , S.UPDT_DATE = SYSDATE , S.UPDT_USER = 'ADMIN' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (S.USER_ID, S.USER_NAME, S.USER_PASS, S.USER_EMAIL, S.USER_USE_YN, S.INST_DATE, S.INST_USER, S.UPDT_DATE, S.UPDT_USER) VALUES (#{userid},#{usernm},#{pass},#{email},#{useyn},sysdate,'ADMIN',sysdate,'ADMIN ')
